title: From Strategy to Execution: Why Portfolio Management Is the Missing Link in Product Leadership
excerpt: Strategy often dies in the gap between slides and sprints. Here’s how a simple portfolio practice closes that gap and keeps teams focused on outcomes.

title: Turning OKRs into Actionable Portfolio Decisions
excerpt: OKRs define intent. A portfolio turns that intent into choices — which problems to pursue, how to allocate capacity, and what to stop doing.

title: Stop Managing Backlogs, Start Managing Portfolios
excerpt: Backlogs keep teams busy. Portfolios keep teams aligned. Shift the conversation from tasks to outcomes and make tradeoffs visible.
